@graph.rdfs:comment: Animals are multicellular eukaryotic organisms that form the biological kingdom Animalia. With few exceptions, animals consume organic material, breathe oxygen, are able to move, can reproduce sexually, and grow from a hollow sphere of cells, the blastula, during embryonic development.
@graph.rdfs:label: Animal

@graph.rdfs:comment: The number of legs an animal has.
@graph.rdfs:label: numberOfLegs

@graph.rdfs:comment: The living environment of an animal. As values for this property you can write plain text of choose from the following: 'https://example-vocab.ex/AnimalLivingEnvironmentFreedom', 'https://example-vocab.ex/AnimalLivingEnvironmentZoo', 'https://example-vocab.ex/AnimalLivingEnvironmentDomestic'
@graph.rdfs:label: animalLivingEnvironment

@graph.rdfs:comment: An enumeration class that lists the possible living environments an animal can have.
@graph.rdfs:label: AnimalLivingEnvironment

@graph.rdfs:comment: The animal lives in a public zoo.
@graph.rdfs:label: AnimalLivingEnvironmentZoo

@graph.rdfs:comment: The animal lives in a private domestic environment.
@graph.rdfs:label: AnimalLivingEnvironmentDomestic

rdfs:comment.@value: The tiger (Panthera tigris) is the largest species among the Felidae and classified in the genus Panthera. It is most recognisable for its dark vertical stripes on orangish-brown fur with a lighter underside.
虎（学名：Panthera tigris），俗称老虎、大虫，被人称为百獸之王，是現存体型最大的两种猫科动物之一（另一种是狮）。野外個體可長達3.38米（11.1英尺）、重388.7公斤（857英磅）（此为狩猎数据，实测数据的最大值为261kg）
